text:
Bodies of two minors who went missing from near Palladam, were recovered from a pit at Arakulam on Friday.

The police said that Ravikumar (14) studying in Standard VIII in a government school, and Gopalakrishnan (14) studying in Standard IX in a government aided school, drowned in the water that stagnated in a stone quarry situated at Arakulam.

Both were from the Ayyampalayam Adi Dravidar Colony. They were found missing on December 30.
title: Bodies recovered
